mapper.select: SELECT ust_no, ust_classify, ust_code, ust_name, ust_buy_cost, ust_buy_cnt, ust_buy_total, ust_sell_cost, ust_sell_cnt, ust_sell_total, ust_stock_cnt, ust_comment, ust_status, ust_delete, user_id, insert_time, update_time FROM user_stock WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND ust_delete = '0' ORDER BY ust_no DESC LIMIT #{nowPage}, #{row}

SELECT ust_no, ust_classify, ust_code, ust_name, ust_buy_cost, ust_buy_cnt, ust_buy_total, ust_sell_cost, ust_sell_cnt, ust_sell_total, ust_stock_cnt, ust_comment, ust_status, ust_delete, user_id, insert_time, update_time FROM user_stock WHERE ust_no = #{ustNo} AND user_id = #{userId} AND ust_delete = '0'
SELECT COUNT(*) as cnt FROM user_stock WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND ust_delete = '0'
